div.p: Do not use language codes in transliterated URLs. "fr/mypage" is not good. "/mypage" is good. URLs with excess code will NOT be addressed at all.
Always start transliterated URLs with '/'. Otherwise, it will be automatically added.
Avoid using special or language-specific symbols and spaces. '/sch√∂nes haus' is not good. '/shoenes-haus' is good. Otherwise, such characters will be automatically replaced or converted.
Avoid applying transliteration for the default language. Otherwise, the direct page URL will not be applied at all, only translations.
